headline: Everest Publishes 2024 Global Loss Triangles
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, June 30, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. ("Everest") (NYSE: EG) a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, today announced that it has published its Global Loss Triangles for the year ended December 31, 2024.
